name: Eva's Maze
description:
This is a demo of a maze runner game I'm still developing, Please have a play and let me know your thoughts.

There are bigger levels/maps and more enemies after the first boss. If difficulty level is set to 'hard', then even more enemies appear and there are less stars available. 11 levels have been developed so far.

Thanks
P.S. Press arrows to move, space bar to fire a star.
